mapper.select: select sample.stable_id as sample_id, count(mutation.mutation_event_id) as number_of_events, genetic_profile.genetic_alteration_type as event_type from mutation inner join genetic_profile on mutation.genetic_profile_id = genetic_profile.genetic_profile_id inner join sample on mutation.sample_id=sample.internal_id where genetic_profile.stable_id in #{item} group by mutation.sample_id

select sample.stable_id as sample_id, count(sample_cna_event.cna_event_id) as number_of_events, genetic_profile.genetic_alteration_type as event_type from sample_cna_event inner join genetic_profile on sample_cna_event.genetic_profile_id = genetic_profile.genetic_profile_id inner join sample on sample_cna_event.sample_id=sample.internal_id where genetic_profile.stable_id in #{item} group by sample_cna_event.sample_id
